feat.title: Autohypnosis
feat.benefit: Your number of healing surges increases by 1.
While you are not bloodied, when you would make an Endurance check, you can make an Arcana check instead.

feat.title: Battlemind Duulora Initiation
feat.benefit: When you use Speed of Thought, each enemy that is adjacent to you at the end of the move is marked until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Battlemind Menace
feat.benefit: When you use your blurred step power, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Blurred Longstep
feat.benefit: When you use your blurred step class power, you shift 2 squares instead of 1 square.

feat.title: Blurring Speed
feat.benefit: When you use your speed of thought power, you also have concealment until the start of your next turn (after any surprise round, if applicable).

feat.title: Bolstering Spike
feat.benefit: When you use your mind spike class power, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
The temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 8 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Brimming Wrath
feat.benefit: When you use your furious assault racial power and have at least 1 power point, each enemy marked by you takes psychic damage equal to your Strength modifier.
This psychic damage increases to 2 + your Strength modifier at 11th level, and to 4 + your Strength modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Crystalline Auger
feat.benefit: Your attacks ignore 5 points of resist psychic.
This increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Darkening Mind
feat.benefit: Your shadow jaunt racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augmentation:
Augment 1: You add 2 squares to the distance you can teleport, and you remain insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Death's Grasp
feat.benefit: You gain the following augmentation for your mind spike class power:
Augment 1
Effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Beginning at 21st level, you also gain the following augment:
Augment 2
Effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes necrotic damage equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Deceptive Mind
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to all defenses while your battle resilience class power is in effect.

feat.title: Defiant Resilience
feat.benefit: The first time that you are bloodied in an encounter, you regain the use of your battle resilience class power with the following trigger:
Trigger: An attack hits or misses you for the first time after you have regained the use of this power.

feat.title: Demand's Reach
feat.benefit: Your battlemind's demand class power increases to a close burst 5 instead of burst 3.

feat.title: Desperate Renewal
feat.benefit: If you are bloodied when you use your second wind, you can choose to regain 2 power points instead of regaining hit points.

feat.title: Dilettante's Mark
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy with the power gained from your Dilettante racial trait, you mark that enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Dual Mind Reserves
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you also regain 1 power point.

feat.title: Eager Mind
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Initiative.
In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws while you are bloodied.

feat.title: Elan Retribution
feat.benefit: When you use your elan resilience bloodline power, each enemy marked by you takes psychic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
This psychic damage increases to 3 + your Constitution modifier at 11th level, and to 6 + your Constitution modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Elemental Guardian
feat.benefit: While you are adjacent to any ally, your innate racial defenses improve. Apply a benefit based on your current Elemental Manifestation.
Earthsoul: Your racial bonus to saving throws increases to +2.
Causticsoul, Cindersoul, Firesoul, Plaguesoul, Voidsoul: Your racial resistance increases by 5.
Ember Soul, Sandsoul, Sunsoul, Watersoul: Your racial bonus to saving throws increases to +4.
Magmasoul: The extra fire damage you deal increases to two dice.

feat.title: Elemental Recovery
feat.benefit: When you would take damage that has a type and you have not yet expended the racial power from your Elemental Manifestation racial trait, you can expend 1 power point as an immediate interrupt to gain resist 5 to the triggering damage type or types until the start of your next turn.
The resist increases to 10 at 11th level, and to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Empty Vessel
feat.benefit: The first time you drop to 0 power points during an encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls, and to Fortitude, Reflex and Will. These bonuses last until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Enlightened Stone
feat.benefit: When you make an Athletics check, you can use your Constitution modifier instead of your Strength modifier.
Also, if you have at least 1 power point when you use your stone's endurance racial power, you also gain a +2 bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Enlightened Transformation
feat.benefit: While under the effects of your razorclaw shifting racial power, you also gain a +1 bonus to Will and a +3 bonus to Insight checks.

feat.title: Fearsome Spike
feat.benefit: When you use your mind spike class power, you can choose to also mark each enemy adjacent to the target until the end of that enemy's next turn.

feat.title: Feral Advance
feat.benefit: When you use your speed of thought class power, you can use your Dexterity modifier in place of your Charisma modifier to determine how far you can move.
If you have the Wild Step racial trait, you ignore difficult terrain during the move.

feat.title: Ferocious Resilience
feat.benefit: When you use your battle resilience class power, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.
This damage bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Feywild Advance
feat.benefit: If you have at least 1 power point when you use your blurred step class power, you can teleport a number of squares equal to your 1 + one-half your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1 square) instead of shifting.

feat.title: Get in Your Head
feat.benefit: Your fade away racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augmentation:
Augment 1: The power gains the Teleportation keyword, and you can teleport 3 squares after becoming invisible.

feat.title: Gritty Determination
feat.benefit: Whenever you use a daily attack power, you gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Group in Motion
feat.benefit: When you use your speed of thought class power, each ally adjacent to you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Guardian's Mishaps
feat.benefit: When you slide a creature in the aura granted by your mantle of misfortune racial power, you can mark that creature until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Halfling Stalwart
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against Large or larger creatures marked by you.

feat.title: Harried Recovery
feat.benefit: The first time during an encounter that you drop to 0 power points, you regain the use of your persistent harrier class power with the following trigger:
Trigger: An attack hits or misses you for the first time after you have regained the use of this power.

feat.title: Harrier's Control
feat.benefit: When you use your persistent harrier class power, you can slide the target 1 square before teleporting, and you mark the target until the end of its next turn.

feat.title: Harrying Step
feat.benefit: When you use your blurred step class power, you can teleport to any square adjacent to the triggering enemy instead of shifting.

feat.title: Hellmind Scorn
feat.benefit: When an enemy successfully saves against a Psychic effect bestowed by you, you can use a free reaction to slide that enemy 1 square and make it gain vulnerable 5 psychic until the end of your next turn.
Starting at 11th level, the vulnerable increases to 7.
Starting at 21st level, you can slide the enemy up to 2 squares, and the vulnerable increases to 10.

feat.title: Immovable Resilience
feat.benefit: When you use your battle resilience class power, you can choose to ignore forced movement until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Improved Speed of Thought
feat.benefit: When you use your speed of though class power, you can move 2 additional squares.

feat.title: Inexorable Speed
feat.benefit: When you use your speed of thought class power, you can move through spaces occupied by enemies and your movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

feat.title: Infectious Wrath
feat.benefit: The first in an encounter that you are bloodied, each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls until the end of his or her next turn.

feat.title: Invigorating Demand
feat.benefit: When you augment your batllemind's demand class power, you gain temporary hit points equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Io's Roar
feat.benefit: Any target hit by your dragon breath racial power or your dragonfeat racial power gains vulnerable 5 psychic until the end of your current turn.
This vulnerable increases to 7 at 11th level, and to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Iron Resolve of Zerthadlun
feat.benefit: While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +1 feat bonus to saving throws.
This increases to +2 while you are bloodied.

feat.title: Iron Trap
feat.benefit: When you use your iron mind racial power and the triggering attack misses, or when any attack misses you because of the bonus granted by the power, you mark the attacker and gain combat advantage against it. Both last until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Keep Them Close
feat.benefit: When you mark an enemy adjacent to you, that enemy is also slowed while it remains marked.

feat.title: Kinetic Reel
feat.benefit: When you use your wild focus class power, you pull the target 2 additional squares.
This increases to 3 additional squares at 21st level.

feat.title: Linebreaker
feat.benefit: When you use your speed of thought class power, you can enter an enemy's space. Doing so ends the movement, and you must then slide the enemy 1 square so that you are no longer in its space.

feat.title: Longtooth Fury
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied and under the effects of your longtooth shifting racial power, you gain an additional +2 bonus to damage rolls against targets marked by you.
This bonus to damage increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Lure of Iron
feat.benefit: You can slide the target of your mind spike class power 1 square.

feat.title: Marked Fortunes
feat.benefit: When you use your Shifting Fortunes racial trait to shift as part of using your second wind, you can mark each enemy adjacent to you at the end of that shift.

feat.title: Marked with Iron
feat.benefit: When you use your iron mind racial power, each target marked by you takes an additional penalty to attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of its next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.

feat.title: Mindfire
feat.benefit: Your darkfire racial power gains the Augmentable keyword and the following augmentation:
Augment 1: You can target Reflex or Will, your choice, and on a hit the target also treats creatures more than 5 squares away from it as having total concealment until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Prescient Spike
feat.benefit: You can use your mind spike class power as an immediate interrupt instead of immediate reaction.

feat.title: Psiforged Resolve
feat.benefit: When you are bloodied and use your warforged resolve racial power, you can choose to regain 1 power point instead of hit points.
The number of power points you regain increases to 2 at 21st level.

feat.title: Psionic Accuracy
feat.benefit: Your elven accuracy racial power gains the Augmentable keyword with the following augment:
Augment 1: You gain combat advantage against the target of the triggering attack roll until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Psionic Celerity
feat.benefit: Whenever you run or charge, you gain a +2 bonus to speed. This does not stack with the Fast Runner feat.
As part of any movement, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 bonus to speed until the end of your current turn.

feat.title: Psionic Ferocity
feat.benefit: When you make an attack as part of your Ferocity racial trait, you can spend 1 power point to deal +1[W] extra damage, or +1d8 extra damage if your attack is not a Weapon attack.

feat.title: Psionic Fortune
feat.benefit: While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.
Also, when you make a saving throw on your turn, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws until the end of your current turn.

feat.title: Psionic Fury
feat.benefit: Your furious assault gains the Augmentable keyword, and the following augment:

Augment 1: Effect: You deal damage to each enemy adjacent to you equal to your Strength modifier or your Dexterity modifier. If the triggering attack was made with a Weapon or Implement, you add its enhancement bonus to the damage. If the triggering attack deals a type of damage, your furious assault gains the corresponding keyword and this damage is of the same time.

feat.title: Psionic Initiative
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 feat bonus to Initiative checks.
Also, when you roll initiative, you can spend 1 power point to increase this to a +6 feat bonus.

feat.title: Psionic Reflexes
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks.
Also, when you make an opportunity attack, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

feat.title: Psionic Rejuvenation
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you also regain 1 power point.

feat.title: Psionic Rush
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can reduce the cost to augment any augmentable power you use during that action.

feat.title: Psionic Scorn
feat.benefit: When you use your fell might recovery class power, you can choose to regain 1 power point instead of regaining your fell might.

feat.title: Psionic Skill
feat.benefit: Choose any skill. You gain a +2 feat bonus to checks with that skill.
Also, when you make a check with the chosen skill, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +3 power bonus to that check.
feat.special: You can take this feat more than one. Each time you take this feat, you must choose a different skill.

feat.title: Resurgent Memory
feat.benefit: When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to enhance an Arcana check, or to enhance an attack roll of a psionic power, you add +1 to the result.

feat.title: Zerth Instincts
feat.benefit: When you use your iron mind racial power, you can also shift 1 square.
In addition, when you are surprised, you can use iron mind as a free interrupt to not be surprised.
